author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-crew-motorfest/

Join the Motorfest archivist on a thrilling ride across Europe to uncover the continent’s most stunning automotive legends in new events every week! Including Bugatti, Porsche and the brand new Triumph brand!

Try the new Luxury Chronicles Europe Playlist starting August 6th in #TheCrewMotorfest.

New to The Crew Motorfest? Download the Free Trial in PlayStation Store and enjoy the game for free for five hours! Everything you unlock during your free trial will be saved and available if you decide to get the game.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #thecrewmotorfest
title: The Crew Motorfest - Luxury Chronicles Europe Playlist Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Get ready to put your dream squad to the test in FC 26 FUT with all new features, inspired by the community. Pre-order FC 26 now: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/ea-sports-fc/


Here’s what is new coming to FC 26 FUT, Tournaments and Live Events, as well as a refreshed Rivals and Champs experience. Tournaments will test your skills with up to four rounds of knockout football, while Live Events add more variety with themed competitions and content all season long. New Bounties allow you to earn additional rewards or accelerate your weekly progress. 

Pre-order EA SPORTS FC 26™ Ultimate Edition by 26 August to receive an untradeable ICON Player Item as soon as you start playing the game. At a later date, it will become an upgraded version to recognise the moment they became a Champion.

EA SPORTS FC 25™ players will also receive an EVO that boosts any player’s shooting to 99 and Pick 1 of 5 untradeable ICON players rated 93+ from previous campaigns including Grassroot Greats, FU
title: FC 26 - Ultimate Team Deep Dive | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10009568

Battlefield 6 Open Beta begins this weekend.
 
Be among the first to jump into the BIGGEST Battlefield Beta yet. Squad up, play new maps and modes, and experience intense all-out warfare with stunning visuals and next-gen gameplay.
 
Get ready to fight, win, and make your mark in the Battlefield 6 Open Beta!
 
Early access begins August 7:
 
Weekend 1: August 9 - 10
Weekend 2: August 14 - 17
  
Subscribe and hit the notification bell to stay updated on the latest news and updates.

#ps5 #ps5games #battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 - Open Beta Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
► Pre-order now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1001-PPSA14251_00-00000NEROPS5SIEA

Sacred of a little competition, Enzo?

Working for the Family may demand ruthlessness from Enzo, but there's no denying that life in the Torrisi villa has its moments of beauty. In this last gameplay video, Cesare shares some parts of the Mafia that don't involve bloodshed.

MAFIA: THE OLD COUNTRY launches August 8, 2025 for PlayStation 5.

Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily.

Fight to survive as Enzo Favara and prove your worth to the Family in this immersive third-person action-adventure.

#ps5 #ps5games 

Rated Mature
title: Mafia: The Old Country - The Family Code: Vehicles & Villas Gameplay | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/fortnite/

Check out the Mighty Morphin Bundle when it hits the Shop mid-August. It includes the Red Ranger, Black Ranger, Pink Ranger, Yellow Ranger, and Blue Ranger Outfits — plus accessories like the Go Go Power Rangers - Redux Jam Track! Battle Pass holders will also be able to unlock the Dino Megazord Outfit by completing Quests starting September 16.

 And prepare to Power Up as Megazord for a splashy midseason takeover.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #fortnite #mightymorphinpowerrangers
title: Fortnite - Bad Bugs vs Power Rangers in Battle Royale: Shock ‘N Awesome | PS5 & PS4 Games

Hela is coming to PlayStation®5 in 2026! See the world through the eyes of a brave mouse in this enchanting co-op adventure game. Explore breathtaking wilds inspired by Scandinavia together with up to three friends, through local split-screen multiplayer and online co-op.

Add Hela to your wishlist today!
